name: V-KING Knockout
description:
Stuck in a debate with your friend, lover, or parent? Instead of fighting over who gets to do the dishes, settle the conflict by playing V-King, to find out, who the stronger Viking is, instead! 

A fast-paced brawler for 2+ players: Let your opponents feel your axe, cunningly evade and parry their attacks and throw them into the water: Find out who of you has Odin on their side! 

Controls:

This game requires at least 2 gamepads to play.
Left Joystick: Move
South-button (Xbox (A), Playstation (X), Switch (B)): Jump
West-button (Xbox (X), Playstation (Square), Switch (Y)): Dash
R1 - Attack
L1 - Parry
Options - Pause

Issues:

  • Controllers have to be connected before starting the game.
